scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Thread_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="linkArea" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Thread_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="endlessScroll" resourceName="endlessScroll" descriptionResourceName="endlessScrollDesc" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="enableFullEditor" resourceName="enableFullEditor" descriptionResourceName="enableFullEditorDesc" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> <property id="pageSize" resourceName="CF_Comment_PageSize" dataType="int" defaultValue="5"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="50" /> </property> <property id="defaultSortOrder" resourceName="SortOrder" dataType="string" defaultValue="Oldest"> <propertyValue value="Oldest" resourceName="SortOrder_Oldest" /> <propertyValue value="Best" resourceName="SortOrder_Best" /> <propertyValue value="Newest" resourceName="SortOrder_Newest" /> </property> <property id="showLikes" resourceName="ShowLikes" descriptionResourceName="ShowLikesDesc" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="showRatings" resourceName="ShowRatings" descriptionResourceName="ShowRatingsDesc" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> <property id="depth" resourceName="depth" descriptionResourceName="depthDesc" dataType="int" defaultValue="3"> <propertyValue value="1" resourceName="depth_1" /> <propertyValue value="2" resourceName="depth_2" /> <propertyValue value="3" resourceName="depth_3" /> <propertyValue value="4" resourceName="depth_4" /> <propertyValue value="5" resourceName="depth_5" /> </property> <property id="includeBest" resourceName="includeBest" descriptionResourceName="includeBestDesc" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyVisibilityValueSelectionControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform"> <propertyValue value="True" resourceName="includeBest_include" propertiesToHide="" propertiesToShow="bestSize" /> <propertyValue value="False" resourceName="includeBest_exclude" propertiesToHide="bestSize" propertiesToShow="" /> </property> <property id="bestSize" resourceName="bestSize" descriptionResourceName="bestSizeDesc" dataType="int" defaultValue="3"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="10" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
